website_summaries.verdict: You won't have to hold your nose after using this powerful little insect fogger.
pros: One of the only insect foggers on the market that adds a pleasant scent to the mix
After setting off the fogger, you can return to a home or office free of bugs, that doesn't smell like a chemical factory
cons: Angled sprayer is easy to spray in the user's face if you don't reach far enough when setting off

customer_reviews.title: Great bomb will use again
customer_reviews.text: Just one can used and in minuets thay just ran out oh the walls did not know there was solo many! Great bomb will use again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bikerboy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't kill spiders
customer_reviews.text: These worked, I found some crunchy bug corpses on the floor after the bombing. However, There are still plenty of spiders just healthy and happy. Either this stuff isn't for spiders, or it just doesn't cover enough area to really hit them up high.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Couse

customer_reviews.title: Effective for Fleas
customer_reviews.text: I used Advantage indoor fogger and it did not seem to get rid of the fleas. About 2 weeks later I got this Black Flag fogger and it was successful. And, when I returned hours later, there was no noticeable odor from the product. Of course I sill opened the windows and put on a few fans for safety. I was really happy with this and will use it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: KEliz

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective..if you listen
customer_reviews.text: Hugely effective. Would recommend. Left a horrid odor but it is a poison so I wasn't expecting it to smell like roses. Make sure you follow directions. Evacuate family and pets. I used in combination with a similar product from a different brand (large home) and let sit in a sealed house for three hours and air out for three. Clean all surfaces, rewash linens and protect food and it will be safe
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Ecroyd

customer_reviews.title: did nothing
customer_reviews.text: I walk back in the house to air it out, and three cockroaches are walking around alive and well. called the number on the box, the lady was nice enough, but told me this product work as a residual effect over the next few weeks I should see less roaches. The box states it works on contact. I have seen no effect. I followed the instruction completely! and I made sure to put on enough and exactly how the box states. I believe that the company has lessened the amount of chemical that works to kill the roaches, like I said No Effect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has done a excellent job
customer_reviews.text: We live in a heavily wooded area and are having rain almost every day. The little bugs, especially ants and other little creatures want to come inside home which I really don't like. I opened my cabinet doors so the fog would cover everything and covered my dishes so the spray wouldn' get on them. Then I went shopping so the fogger had time to work. When I returned home I found dead critters, more than I expected, I am very happy with this product and recommend this to you all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K.

customer_reviews.title: They work, but won't eliminate the underlying problem.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They killed a large portion of adult fleas but I still found quite a bit more the following morning. I didn't expect these to eliminate the problem completely though. The eggs and larva always end up being the hard part. Regardless, these do work just don't expect them to be the only step.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Junk....
customer_reviews.text: Junk... I thought black flag was the best for killing roaches, apparently not. All this did was make the roaches go into hiding for a few hours. Followed the directions exactly. Now it's like it was before. The scent is nasty and it left a slimy residue on everything. Waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: I had a plumbing leak in Florida which drained garbage disposal food from the sink under the house and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a plumbing leak in Florida which drained garbage disposal food from the sink under the house and created a roach infestation. I used 4 bombs under the house and 2 inside. I've never seen a roach apocalypse of this magnitude. They were crawling out of everywhere and dying in 10 minutes. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Have to hold the button manually
customer_reviews.text: The activation tab would not latch, so it doesn’t function as a bug bomb. Instead it requires you to hold the tab down. I had this issue with two of two that I tried so far out of the six in the pack. Amazon is sending another box. I will try to update this when I know if the replacement has the same issue or not.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my kids kept waking up with spider bites on their legs. They were very easy to use and worked well. I don’t see any bugs or spiders on the floors but my kids aren’t waking up with spider bites anymore. I was very hesitant to buy these but would recommend them to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to deploy
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to bomb our garage to get rid of black widows! Just make sure there aren’t any places the smoke can seep out or else you won’t get everything. With so many in the box you can bomb multiple times to make sure you get everything. With never using them before I was able to figure them out quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked so-so. Will F you up if youre in the room setting off multiples.
customer_reviews.text: I set three of these things off in my garage in order to kill black widow babies. Aside from coughing and hacking and feeling "off" for the next 2 hours afterwards (even though I was covering my mouth), it didnt kill all of them. Maybe half. You'd really have to put on a gas mask and bomb 6 -10 of these things if you want "total kill".
customer_reviews.author: James Gresham

customer_reviews.title: works well in enclosed areas
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our outdoor sheds to kill wasps, it does work well to kill the nests in these enclosed but not air tight sheds.
customer_reviews.author: Brinda

customer_reviews.title: Not great for fleas
customer_reviews.text: Bombed my house according to instructions and still caught adult fleas in traps the following night. I found some dead fleas immediately after, but I bought these to kill ALL of them, not just a portion. I agree with other reviewers - this product seems to work great on bigger insects, just not fleas.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon price compared to even a big box store
customer_reviews.text: This fogger works fairly well, most only last a few months. Great Amazon price compared to even a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: shelleychez

customer_reviews.title: To increase the amount of roaches...buy this.
customer_reviews.text: You would think that six foggers you should have seen some type of reduction.. but I bought 2boxes and put all 12 foggers down at one time and it seems like the roaches have multiplied. So now I'm paying for exterminator service
customer_reviews.author: omisso

customer_reviews.title: Great job, Black Flag!
customer_reviews.text: I bombed my house (southern Arizona), and I found more bugs dead than were advertised on the box. Rest assured that these bombs will kill nearly anything that is creeping around your house. Buy them and try it out if you are having issues with creepy crawlies!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Family

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rid of Millers
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16' X 12' shed that was infested with millers. Every time I opened the door, hundreds would fly out. These foggers did the trick. I would set one off in in the late afternoon and leave the doors closed overnight. After the first one, there were hundreds of dead millers and a couple dead wasps the next day. The next day I used another one and there were maybe a dozen dead millers. I started setting one off every other day until I used all six to catch any that may have hatched after the earlier applications. Haven't seen any miller since.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swails

customer_reviews.title: I set these off in my fifth wheel trailer that ...
customer_reviews.text: I set these off in my fifth wheel trailer that has been sitting unused for ten years........those little critters didn't stand a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great inside cars!
customer_reviews.text: We had ants in our car and this thing worked like a charm. No residue was left and it didn’t stink. We just had to vacuumed up the dead bugs, which is a good problem if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: CamrynMcLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: only 1 of them even worked
customer_reviews.text: this product comes in a pack of 6. They are really small and only one of them worked the rest i had to throw in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: So that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps those pesky evil demon bugs my wife calls cockroaches out of the house. So that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as you'd hope get extra
customer_reviews.text: Did not kill all the bugs, there weren't as many but ones from all different stages of life survived. I highly suggest buying 2-3 BOXES just to have for the next go around and use an extra one or two cans when you bomb for working results.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan manuele

customer_reviews.title: I tried this once, and I don't know if ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this once, and I don't know if I did it right but it just seemed to make the german roaches angry. I will try this again, following directions to the letter, and then write a more proper review.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I set off a couple in my attic and one in my garage and I never see any pests for at least a year. I used a commercial exterminator, but that cost is eliminated. Add something around your foundation outside, I use diatomaceous earth and Neem oil, which are pet friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Derwah

customer_reviews.title: For flea's and dust mites.
customer_reviews.text: After using fogger two to three days later was still getting bit. We don't own any pet. B.een living here 19 years never had any pet in home. Fogger did not work, I am senior and still getting bites on lower legs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don't breath in
customer_reviews.text: Very strong kills bugs dead do not breath in it will strangle you.
customer_reviews.author: Fárealsss

customer_reviews.title: Not a single bug Died
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do a dang thing. Not a single dead bug was found. In addition, later that day we saw very healthy and alive bugs parading around flaunting their success over my attempted raid on them. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Price !!
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on hand all the time and these are worth the price for the quantity . I suggest you try them and see but Do Go By the Directions !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Watson

customer_reviews.title: kills bug dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked great ! we bombed inside the house and underneath for fleas. Seem to have worked very well. have not seen a flea for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS FAST
customer_reviews.text: MOSTLY DUE TO A MASS OF HOUSE HOLD FLIES AND FRUIT FLIES, NOW ALL GONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this product! Does not work... I never write reviews but I feel I have to because I waited 4 hours to go back into my house and as soon as I entered my bedroom which I put a can in I got attacked by fleas! I did not even see 1 died flea in my house when I swept and mopped the floors. I’m so sick out all theses products that say they get rid of these pest but they don’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black flag should be red flag for stop
customer_reviews.text: These were to kill and not promote more bugs but that is what they did. They do not kill roaches at all. Real waste of time and money. They are useless.
customer_reviews.author: crewzen

customer_reviews.title: KILLER BUG KILLER
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several brands and must say, BLACK FLAG is the best!!! Excellent product. If I need foggers again, this is the brand I choose. A+++
customer_reviews.author: jackie everhart

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good smell ,but I had use twice and only found a few. They are still around might try one more before moving to another brand
customer_reviews.author: Estevan

customer_reviews.title: Not much in the cans.
customer_reviews.text: I hope the chemicals work well as the amount per can is way lower than in years past. They kept a low price point, but there is a lot less actual product.
customer_reviews.author: dksirstone

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my basement to get rid of any hiding bugs ajd it worked great. I used 2 cans at once since its a large area and the effectiveness of the spray was all over the floor when i returned to find lots of dead crickets, flies and spiders.
customer_reviews.author: justin masters

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Used in our business, which is in a shopping center. I don't want to spend a lot on exterminators, because the other tenants do not treat their units. Found lots of dead bugs-so that's a win in my book!! I will continue to treat monthly!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected!
customer_reviews.text: 6 pack in the box, works ok, not as good as I was expecting, Imy house downstairs is about 1800sqf, I sprayed 2 bottle at a time for consecutive 2 times, but still having fries and mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work still have bugs even though everything opened up and removed

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to clear the problem but used more foggers than recommended to address all the necessary rooms on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Used for house fly problem in the home during the fall. Seemed to clear the problem but used more foggers than recommended to address all the necessary rooms on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Zinga

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Our unfinished basement is creepy crawling bug free. Had 2 leftover and tried it for a fruit fly invasion caused by a rogue peach, didn't work for those tenacious buggers.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work like they should, better, there was no need for a thorough clean up
customer_reviews.text: No more bugs, put some in the garage, the barn and spare rooms, no big clean up and no BUGS,

customer_reviews.title: Faulty

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product because it was easy to use and it worked.

customer_reviews.title: No more stink bugs
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with stinkbugs in my attic I thought I had a call in an exterminator put three of them off which was probably overkill haven’t seen one since

customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all, in fact drove the bugs out of hiding. Trying to take care of bugs left by previous tenants.

customer_reviews.text: Good product, very good quality, easy to use and excellent, recommended by the seller

customer_reviews.text: I live in a 220 sq ft tiny apartment, used all six of these foggers over a span of ~2 weeks and we still have flies. We can’t stay in our home still!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for fleas.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for flea control. Killed other bugs but didn't work so well on fleas. Ended up purchasing PT Alpine spray which actually did rid us of fleas.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective. Activate the canisters, leave for a ...

product_meta.title: Black Flag 11079 HG-11079 6 Count Indoor Fogger
product_meta.description: Style:Pack of 1Insects invading your corner of the world? Whatever insect you're fighting, Black Flag products are dedicated to providing the tools you need to regain control. With formulas that act fast and never back down, Black Flag insect controls have been arming homeowners in the battle against invading bugs for more years than any other brand. Stop bugs before they raid your kitchen and home with Black Flag Concentrated Fogger. This package contains 6 aerosol cans that release a concentrated fog. Each 1.25 oz can treats a room up to 2,000 cubic feet (or approximately 15.5 feet by 16 feet with an 8-foot ceiling). Black Flag Concentrated Fogger controls a variety of household pests, including roaches, ants (except fire, carpenter, harvester and pharaoh ants), fleas, spiders (except brown recluse), mosquitoes, silverfish, brown dog ticks, houseflies and more as listed. Keeps killing German cockroaches up to 12 weeks on non-porous surfaces. This product will not control bed bugs. Black Flag Concentrated Fogger won’t leave a wet, messy residue. It’s perfect for use in apartments, homes, attics, basements, garages, and household storage areas. Includes convenient hang tags to alert others when they can safely re-enter treated area.
feature_bullets: KILLS BY CONTACT: Controls a variety of household pests, including roaches, ants (except fire, carpenter, harvester and pharaoh ants), fleas, spiders (except brown recluse), mosquitoes, silverfish, brown dog ticks, houseflies and more as listed
EACH CAN TREATS UP TO 2,000 CUBIC FEET: Use one can to treat a room approximately 15.5 feet by 16 feet with an 8-foot ceiling
DUAL ACTION: Kills insects and leaves a fresh scent
USE INDOORS: Treat in apartments, homes, attics, basements, garages, and household storage areas
